name: Chasing Tales: Mosa the Majestic
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood short bow and perform tasks to re-create Mosa's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Mosa the Majestic.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Mosa at a heroic font.
